title: Welp (PBE)
body: I'm now in PBE serve and I already download the Alpha Cilent but I cant create my account!! Need help how do I create my account?

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and I see that you were accepted to help test the Alpha Client but not the PBE.  After downloading and installing the Alpha Client, you should be able to login with the same account you signed up with.  It won't be necessary to create a new account.
Ok thank!! let me give it a try :)
